title: Harmony in Ancient Realm
prompt: Generate a 1000 word long story about an ancient time where locomotion was on horses, agriculture was using cattle. Nature was pristine where people could drink water from anywhere. There was plenty of fruits, vegetables and full of harmony. People were so fond and caring towards nature and its animals. There was no crime no hate. Compare and contrast with present times as well. Everyone cared for each other. Be creative, use many adjectives.
